#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
long long fact[1000009],sum[1000009];
void solve()
{
	fact[1]=1;fact[2]=2;sum[1]=1;sum[2]=3;
	for(int i=3;i<1000009;i++)
	{
		fact[i]=i*fact[i-1];
		if(fact[i]>=1000000007)
		fact[i]%=1000000007;
		sum[i]=fact[i]+sum[i-1];
		
		if(sum[i]>=1000000007)
		sum[i]%=1000000007;
	//	cout<<fact[i]<<" "<<sum[i];
	}
}
int main() {
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	solve();
//	cout<<endl;
	while(t--)
	{
		int a,b;
		cin>>a>>b;
		cout<<(1000000007+sum[b]-sum[a-1])%1000000007<<endl;
		
	}
	return 0;
}
